entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
